document_data.name: Aothir
document_data.mainbody: '''Aothir''' was a [[dwarf]] who lived in [[Neverwinter]] in the late years of the 15{{Th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Aothir was a portly, red-bearded dwarf.
document_data.Activities: Aothir was an armorer who owned a stand in the market square of the [[Protector's Enclave]]. He sold [[armor]]s made by his friends from [[Sundabar]], his hometown.
document_data.History:
Aothir proclaimed himself to be an [[heir of Delzoun]], and in his younger years he traveled the [[North Faerûn|North]] in search of fabled [[Gauntlgrym]]. However, at some point he retired from his quest and opened an armory in Neverwinter.

Aothir survived the attack of the "[[Seldra Tylmarande|Lost Heir]]" of [[Alagondar]] and his [[plaguechanged]] minions of [[1479 DR]] not only once,
